name: Erebor Bank
description: Erebor Bank is a cutting-edge digital-only national bank founded by renowned tech entrepreneurs Peter Thiel and Palmer Luckey. Specializing in innovative banking solutions for artificial intelligence (AI), cryptocurrency, defense, and advanced manufacturing technology companies, Erebor Bank seamlessly blends traditional banking services with modern virtual currency and fintech offerings. Designed for forward-thinking businesses, Erebor Bank delivers secure, technology-driven financial services tailored to the digital economy.
